Introduction

Eden is a South Korean singer. He is a member of EPIC TRAVELS, former member of the boy groups WeNU, BIGFLO, and a pre-debut member of the boy group WE:A.

He made his solo debut on February 26, 2019, with the digital single "Wake Me Up" under the name Yuseong.

Eden is currently on hiatus due to health issues. In January 2025, it was reported that he was experiencing difficulty breathing and worsening health problems, leading to his hiatus.
